item.title: 好莱坞已经在人工智能视频方面落后了
item.description:
娱乐行业希望避免重蹈互联网诞生之初的覆辙。【原文：

The entertainment industry wants to avoid a repeat of what happened at the dawn of the internet.

】

item.title: 新西兰银行家敦促新西兰央行进一步提出更宽松的资本建议
item.description: 一个银行业游说团体认为，新西兰央行应进一步放宽资本要求。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank should go further with its proposals to ease capital requirements, according to a banking industry lobby group.】

item.title: 热爱法拉利的交易员以 1.1 万分之 1 的杠杆率押注债券，烧毁了华尔街
item.description:
花旗集团和 MUFG 是受 26 亿美元交易影响的公司之一，该交易目前是伦敦诉讼的核心，引发了对客户支票的质疑

。【原文：

Citigroup and MUFG were among the firms stung by $2.6 billion trade that’s now at the heart of a London lawsuit, raising questions about client checks

】

item.title: 比亚迪的 "天轨 "项目是电动汽车巨头罕见的失误
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司创始人王传福尝试过很多事情。生产电池、制造电子产品，以及最近比亚迪最著名的电动汽车。但十多年来，他还一直在尝试建立另一项事业--单轨铁路网，以同时解决交通拥堵和碳排放问题。【原文：Wang Chuanfu, the founder of BYD Co., has tried his hand at many things. Producing batteries, making electronics and most recently, what BYD is famous for, electric vehicles. But for more than a decade, he’s also been attempting to build out another enterprise — a monorail network to solve the problems of congestion and carbon emissions at the same time.】

item.title: Firefly Aerospace 达成收购 SciTec.Inc：M&A 公司快照
item.description: Firefly Aerospace 表示，该公司已达成最终协议，将以约 8.55 亿美元的现金和股票收购 SciTec。【原文：Firefly Aerospace says it entered into a definitive agreement to acquire SciTec for approximately $855 million in cash and stock.】

item.title: 阿根廷人海外购物挥霍数十亿美元，引发货币危机
item.description:
阿根廷人跨境疯狂购物，使米莱伊政府在努力支撑比索的同时损失数十亿美元

。【原文：

Argentines are going on cross-border shopping sprees, costing Milei's government billions as it tries to prop up the peso

】

item.title: 高市获胜后日元下跌，日本股市或受提振
item.description: 日本股市和长期国债收益率可能会在周一开盘时上涨，此前执政党投票结果显示支持刺激政策的立法者佐那江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）将成为下一任首相。日元兑美元走软。【原文：Japanese stocks and long-term government bond yields will likely rise when markets open on Monday, after a ruling-party vote positioned pro-stimulus lawmaker Sanae Takaichi to become the next prime minister. The yen was indicated weaker against the dollar.】

item.title: 债券交易员敢于在 4% 收益率消失前做多
item.description: 今年以来，债券投资者利用美联储降息和美国短期收益率下跌的有利时机，大获全胜。【原文：Bond investors have ridden a profitable playbook this year to score big wins on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts and tumbling short-term US yields.】

item.title: 绿党波兰斯基为英国财富税提出 "爱国 "理由
item.description: 英国绿党新任领导人扎克-波兰斯基（Zack Polanski）表示，他希望挑战右翼对爱国主义的 "垄断"，并提出了吸引对首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的工党感到失望的左翼英国人的目标。【原文：The UK Green Party’s new leader Zack Polanski said he wants to challenge the right-wing’s “monopoly” on patriotism, as he set out his bid to attract left-leaning Britons disillusioned by Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s Labour Party.】

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特专辑发布派对为影院带来 3300 万美元收入
item.description: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的试听派对上播放了她新专辑《歌舞女郎的生活》（The Life of a Showgirl）中的个人感言和歌词音乐视频，成为本周末美国和加拿大影院票房最高的影片。【原文：A Taylor Swift listening party, featuring personal reflections from the artist and music videos with lyrics from her new album The Life of a Showgirl, was the highest grossing picture in US and Canadian cinemas this weekend.】

item.title: 世界最大养老基金将影响力投资列入议程
item.description: 日本 1.8 万亿美元的养老基金是世界上最大的养老基金，该基金决定考虑转向社会企业投资，这在该国的资金管理者中引发了更广泛的调整。【原文：A decision by Japan’s $1.8 trillion pension fund, the world’s biggest, to consider a shift into impact investing has triggered a wider adjustment among the country’s money managers.】

item.title: 从股票到黄金，交易员为对冲风险付出了更高的代价
item.description: 从股票到黄金等资产的期权风险溢价都在上升，而基准指数的隐含波动率在今年大部分时间里要么保持稳定，要么有所下降。【原文：The risk premium for options is rising in assets from stocks to gold, even as implied volatility on benchmark indexes has been either steady or falling for most of this year.】

item.title: 马斯克的神经链接公司向期刊提交大脑植入患者数据
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的大脑植入公司神经链接公司（Neuralink Corp.【原文：Neuralink Corp., Elon Musk’s brain implant company, has submitted a scientific paper to a journal describing the results from some of its patients, which would be its first peer-reviewed publication with human data.】

item.title: 股票交易者在高估值中应对长期停摆
item.description: 在关键的财报季到来之前，美国股市的迅猛涨势所面临的威胁正在加剧。由于政府停摆看不到尽头，交易员们正在为停摆后的股市做好准备，因为股市估值已达到令人瞠目的水平，劳动力市场也出现了降温迹象。【原文：Ahead of the crucial earnings season, threats to the torrid US stock market rally are compounding. With no end in sight for the government shutdown, traders are gearing up for the aftermath as equity valuations are at eye-watering levels and the labor market shows signs of cooling.】

item.title: 拉加德称法国总统职位是 "可怕的工作"，不适合她
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德淡化了她可能有野心成为下一任法国总统的说法。【原文：Christine Lagarde played down suggestions that she may have ambitions to become the next French president.】

item.title: 新兴市场动态：资金流入获得牵引力（播客）
item.description: Marcus Wong 和 Malavika Kaur Makol 讨论了新兴市场资产在今年最后三个月的表现，其中流入发展中市场资产的资金将增加。【原文：Marcus Wong and Malavika Kaur Makol discuss how emerging-market assets are set to perform in the last three months of the year, with inflows set to gain traction into developing market assets.】

item.title: 多头扎堆新兴市场，动能重现
item.description: 新兴市场资产有望在今年取得辉煌业绩，投资者预计流入股票和债券的资金将在最后一个季度获得增长势头。【原文：Emerging market assets look set to cap a banner year, with investors expecting inflows into equities and bonds to gain momentum in the final quarter.】

item.title: 苹果将硬件主管约翰-特纳斯置于继任者的聚光灯下
item.description: 随着高管继任迫在眉睫，苹果公司正在加强对硬件主管约翰-特纳斯的关注。此外：公司下架 "Vision Air"，专注于眼镜产品，但 Vision Pro 和 iPad Pro 的更新迫在眉睫。【原文：Apple is intensifying the spotlight on hardware chief John Ternus as executive succession looms. Also: The company shelves the “Vision Air” to focus on glasses, but updates of the Vision Pro and iPad Pro are imminent.】

item.title: 伊朗发出信号：不畏制裁，努力解决核僵局
item.description: 伊朗外交部长表示，伊朗已准备好恢复解决核僵局的努力，但他称与联合国原子能监察机构的合作 "不够充分"。【原文：Iran’s foreign minister said the country is ready to resume efforts to resolve its nuclear standoff but called cooperation with the UN atomic watchdog “insufficient.”】

item.title: 欧佩克+同意 11 月石油供应小幅增加 13.7 万桶/日
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+同意小幅增加 11 月份的石油产量。【原文：OPEC+ agreed to a modest increase in its November oil production, delegates said.】

item.title: 印度孟加拉邦洪水和山体滑坡造成至少 17 人死亡
item.description: 据当地报道，印度东部西孟加拉邦大吉岭的持续降雨导致洪水和山体滑坡，造成至少 17 人死亡。【原文：Incessant rains in Darjeeling in the eastern Indian state of West Bengal led to floods and landslides which have at least 17 people dead, according to local reports.】

item.title: 欧佩克+接近达成 11 月增产 13.7 万桶/日的原则性协议
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+组织已接近达成原则协议，将在11月份再次小幅增加供应量，该组织将继续努力恢复其在全球石油市场的份额，尽管人们普遍预期全球石油将出现大量过剩。【原文：OPEC+ is close to an agreement in principle to make another modest supply increase for November as the group continues efforts to recoup its share of global oil markets, despite broad expectations for a large global surplus, delegates said.】

item.title: 人工智能需求强劲，英伟达合作伙伴鸿海达到预期销售额
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的主要服务器生产合作伙伴鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s major server production partner Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. reported 11% growth in quarterly sales, signaling healthy demand for AI infrastructure.】

item.title: 英国将在犹太教堂袭击事件后限制抗议活动
item.description: 英国内政大臣沙巴娜-马哈茂德（Shabana Mahmood）将赋予警方新的权力，限制反复举行的抗议活动，并正在考虑立法彻底禁止抗议活动，此前数周的示威活动导致数百人被捕，资源紧张。【原文：UK Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood will give police new powers to place limits on repeated protests and is considering legislation to ban them outright, after weeks of demonstrations led to hundreds of arrests and strained resources.】

item.title: 越南预计第三季度经济增长率将达 8.22
item.description: 越南财政部长阮文当（Nguyen Van Thang）表示，在制造业增长 10%的推动下，第三季度越南经济可能比去年同期增长 8.22%。【原文：Vietnam’s economy likely expanded 8.22% from a year earlier in the third quarter, driven by 10% growth in the manufacturing sector, according to Finance Minister Nguyen Van Thang.】

item.title: 贬值 "交易刺激风险反弹，比特币升至创纪录水平
item.description: 比特币再创历史新高，因为围绕美国政府停摆的更广泛的风险反弹提振了全球最大的加密货币。【原文：Bitcoin set another all-time high as a broader risk rally around the US government shutdown buoyed the world’s largest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 普拉博沃要求军队防范外国组织对原始资源的破坏
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）要求军方保护印尼丰富的自然资源不受外国实体的侵害，并称外国实体一直在 "偷窃 "和 "走私 "印尼的资产。【原文：President Prabowo Subianto told the military to guard Indonesia’s vast natural resources from foreign entities, saying such groups have been “stealing” and “smuggling” the country’s assets.】

item.title: 在加沙执行援助任务期间被以色列扣押的马来西亚人获释
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，在加沙执行人道主义援助任务时被以色列拘留的马来西亚活动人士已经获释并被遣送回土耳其。【原文：Malaysian activists detained by Israel while on a humanitarian aid mission to Gaza have been released and deported to Turkey, Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said.】

item.title: 提交数据后，印度尼西亚撤销了对 TikTok 的许可暂停
item.description: 印度尼西亚撤销了对 TikTok 本地运营许可证的暂停，因为该社交媒体平台分享了政府要求的数据。【原文：Indonesia revoked a suspension on TikTok’s local operating license after the social media platform shared data requested by the government.】

item.title: 高市获胜支撑日本股市，打压日元和债券
item.description: 支持刺激政策的佐那江隆一在日本执政党领导人选举中出人意料地获胜后，日本股市可能会得到支撑，而日元和长期政府债券则会受到压力。【原文：Japan’s stock market will likely get support while the yen and long-term government bonds come under pressure following the surprise victory of pro-stimulus Sanae Takaichi in the nation’s ruling party leadership election.】
